typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		AccountId as short,
		Code as string,
		Name as string,
		Country as string,
		City as string,
		Nationality as string,
		Currency as string,
		Address1 as string,
		Address2 as string,
		Address3 as string,
		PhoneNo as long,
		EmailId as string,
		CreditLimit as double,
		CreditType as string,
		DuePeriod as boolean,
		Active as boolean,
		EnableMultipleCurrency as boolean,
		Segment as string,
		EnableSpecialPrice as string,
		SpecialPriceType as string,
		SpecialDiscountPercent as string,
		Ported as boolean,
		GSTTIN as string,
		Outstanding as string,
		PaymentTerms as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	wildcardPaths:['dboAccounts.csv']) ~> source1
source(output(
		AccountId as short,
		Code as string,
		Name as string,
		Country as string,
		City as string,
		Nationality as string,
		Currency as string,
		Address1 as string,
		Address2 as string,
		Address3 as string,
		PhoneNo as string,
		EmailId as string,
		CreditLimit as double,
		CreditType as string,
		DuePeriod as short,
		Active as boolean,
		EnableMultipleCurrency as boolean,
		Segment as string,
		EnableSpecialPrice as string,
		SpecialPriceType as string,
		SpecialDiscountPercent as string,
		Ported as boolean,
		GSTTIN as string,
		Outstanding as double,
		PaymentTerms as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	wildcardPaths:['dboAccounts1.csv']) ~> source2
source1, source2 join(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
Join1 sink(input(
		AccountId as integer,
		Code as string,
		Name as string,
		Country as string,
		City as string,
		Nationality as string,
		Currency as string,
		Address1 as string,
		Address2 as string,
		Address3 as string,
		PhoneNo as string,
		EmailId as string,
		CreditLimit as decimal(18,2),
		CreditType as string,
		DuePeriod as integer,
		Active as boolean,
		EnableMultipleCurrency as boolean,
		Segment as integer,
		EnableSpecialPrice as boolean,
		SpecialPriceType as string,
		SpecialDiscountPercent as decimal(18,2),
		Ported as boolean,
		GSTTIN as string,
		Outstanding as decimal(18,2),
		PaymentTerms as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
